full_summary:
===============

Government Tender Announcement
------------------------------

### Notice Title

Open Construction Source List for CFB Kingston

### Tender Reference Number

MX-22636074774

### Solicitation Number

OR23SLKN

### Tender Status

Open

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites contractors and suppliers to apply for inclusion on the Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required by the Department of National Defence at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston and its satellite sites in Brockville and Cornwall.

The OCSL will be used to tender construction services with an estimated value of $10 million and below. Interested contractors and suppliers may request to be placed on the OCSL at any time. However, Defence Construction Canada (DCC) encourages interested parties to submit their request as soon as possible, preferably by January 23, 2023.

### Language

Contractors and suppliers must select their preferred official language (English or French) for the OCSL. The selected language will be used for all future tenders and contract documents.

### Requirements and Conditions

To be included on the OCSL, contractors and suppliers must:

* Meet the stated requirements as outlined in the tender documents
* Hold a valid MERX account and agree to submit electronic bids
* Be eligible for contract award and demonstrate ability to meet contract requirements
* Comply with DCC's Procurement Code of Conduct and Defence Production Act requirements

### Security Requirements

Contractors and suppliers must actively hold the required security clearance(s) at the time of tender closing. DCC may publish quarterly Advance Procurement Notices (APNs) to provide interested parties with the opportunity to begin the sponsorship request process for obtaining the required security clearance(s).

### Contact Information

For further information or to request clarification, please contact:

Jacob Lachapelle
Jacob.Lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the selection criteria and evaluation process, are available on MERX (http://www.merx.com). Contractors and suppliers are advised to review the tender documents carefully before submitting their application.

### Important Notes

DCC reserves the right to reject any application that does not meet the stated requirements. Contractors and suppliers are advised to ensure that their application is complete and accurate to avoid rejection.
